title: Three Nominations Sent to the Senate Today â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
June 29, 2017
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Brendan Carr, of Virginia, to be a Member of the Federal Communications Commission for the remainder of the term expiring June 30, 2018, vice Thomas Edgar Wheeler.Brendan Carr, of Virginia, to be a Member of the Federal Communications Commission for a term of five years from July 1, 2018. (Reappointment)Kay Bailey Hutchison, of Texas, to be United States Permanent Representative on the Council of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization, with the rank and status of Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary.
